title: Informative Poster and Presentation Rubric
description: This rubric helps students understand the criteria for creating effective informative posters and presentations.

title: Story Sorting
description: Storytelling is an essential skill that helps students organize their thoughts and communicate effectively. This worksheet guides students through the process of sorting story elements to enhance their narrative skills.

title: Rainforest
description: This presentation is designed to educate students about the importance of rainforests, their ecosystems, and conservation efforts.
